generateLevel(int, int) - Static method in class utilities.MapLoader
Generates a level represented as a 2d Tile array of approximately the dimensions given

NOTE:
This method will not retrun a Tile array of the exact specified dimensions, and it should not be expected to.

getCamera() - Method in class game_engine.ZombieHouse3d
In the interests of beginning to encapsulate this messy legacy code, I set the camera to private and created this getter so that other classes, like the EntityManager, can use player's field of view and far clip settings to create lighting and other spooky effects
getHealthBar() - Method in class entities.Zombie

getRegion() - Method in class levels.Tile
 
getTileSize() - Static method in class levels.Tile
returns the type 0-6 of the tile where 0 is a wall tile and 1-6 are colors of floor tile: r,o,y,g,b,v respectively
getType() - Method in class levels.Tile
Gets the type of the tile.
getTypeInt() - Method in class levels.Tile
returns an integer representation of this tiles TileType where the integers correspond as follows:
0 - wall
1 - region1
2 - region2
3 - region3
4 - region4
5 - exit
